name: FNF Opheebop Test
description:
It's Opheebop from Week "2" Salty's Sunday Night! Play as Opheebop in Week 2 and Week 5! Credits do really go to Tsuraran for making the Salty's Sunday Night! Play on the web here on a PC/Mobile devices! If you want, if you have a windows computer, you can also download it with the download button below!

Controls: 

To switch to touch control, touch the toggle in game.

Arrow keys to play the sounds (For mobile press D-pad button)

Hold space and press any other arrow key for secondary sound

Hold any of the buttons to hold a pose!

Check out the Friday Night Funkin here: https://ninja-muffin24.itch.io/funkin

Also check out Friday Night Funkin on Newgrounds: https://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/770371

Check out the original Salty's Sunday Night mod: https://gamebanana.com/mods/43252
